bug.author: wxcafe
bug.summary: [BUG] pwnagotchi says channel is free when it's actually full
bug.description:
Describe the bug pwnagotch says channel 11 is empty, but channel 11 is actually quite full To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: Let the pwnagotchi run for ~13h I guess? No input Expected behavior Not get notices that a channel that's full is empty
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3009327/66666938-cf71e500-ec1f-11e9-88fc-2a2f0cdeb19c.png></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version: 1.0.0RC2 OS version: whatever's in 1.0.0RC2 Type of hardware: Pi Zero W with the waveshare hat Any additional hardware used: none

comments.comment: that was a legacy feature, disabling it now, thanks for the report üëç
